Jerry Carlsen  submitted a UOF for your review.

UOF Link

Summary:

DR: 16-253663

Date: 9/28/2016 7:58 AM

Location: 550 Flower

# of Deputies using Force: 8

Initial Call: Uncooperative Inmate

Notification Summary:

On 9/28/16 at about 0758 hours, Dep.

J. Dorn was talking to an inmate who was standing in
Module B's vestibule.

The inmate, Raymond Muniga (bk# 2955064) appeared agitated and
uncooperative. Dep.

Dorn entered the vestibule through the hallway door with two additional
deputies, Dep.
B. Tucker and Dep. C. Palomares-Velasco.

Muniga assumed a fighting stance
and was holding one of his shoes in his hand.

Dep. Dorn ordered Muniga two times to drop the
shoe and turn around to be cuffed.

Dorn grabbed Muniga
by his shoulder.
Muniga tried to turn away to break Dep. Dorn's grasp. Dep.

Dorn, Tucker,
and Palomares-Velasco pulled Muniga to the ground to gain control.
Muniga kicked Dep. Palomares-Velasco several times, a violation of CPC 240/243(b).

Five additional deputies
responded to help gain control of Muniga.

Muniga was transported to OC Global Santa Ana to
be treated for his injuries.
